title: Leblanc Nerfs inc
body:
LeBlanc
Distortion (W) speed has been reduced to ~1300 from ~1600.
Ethereal Chains (E) missile width reduced to 55 from 70


https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=LMTC4ofkoCo

replies.body:
Looks like this is going live. I must say I'm surprised.

I was watching some PBE gameplay with it and the number of after images needs to be reduced.... after a while it was making my eyes water.

I like the E nerf. Her current E hitbox is actually the most meth infested thing in League, and it's not bias, I love playing LB from time to time too. But I think the W nerfs are a little much, it's TOO slow now. Not only will this be really awkward for frequent LB players but it'll be too easy to land point blanc charms and other cc abilities on her in lane now. That was the whole point, if you had good enough reflexes to CC her mid dodge then it was really rewarding, seems a lot easier to do now. At the end of the say she IS an assassin and her shit is MEANT to be fast

Riot so sh*t.

Why not buff a few underpowered Champions for a change instead of nerfing everyone to sh*t.

Game will be like a game of pong soon.

Yeah but if they continue to nerf at the rate they are, eventually the game will be so super balanced it will come down to two Champions and which one positions slightly better in a fight then the game will snowball in that teams favour.

They're nerfing a Champ with high mobility that does so quickly so that you can attack her during her distorts or to help you dodge them when this is a key component I her kit and Champions like Yasuo etcetera dash around the field being relatively untargetable and this is a recent design.

They have no idea how to balance they're just nerfing favourite of the month Champions and leaving the ones that are actually hard to deal with - with a wide selection of Champions untouched.

that is a horrendous way to view things, I have to admit I don't play the game thinking like that even if I can be negative

{{champion:83}}  rework is intended to be make him more viable and more fun. It's going to be a buff. He's getting a Sion level rework.

They are buffing a decent number of people.
They recently buffed {{champion:98}} . Who really needed it.
{{champion:126}} was recently buffed in the PBE. Someone that was falling behind a little bit.
{{champion:102}} is getting a mechanical buff that would increase her damage over long drawn out fights. Someone who is played decently often and well in LCS.

Fast rewind to the start of season, {{champion:44}} was buffed to better his support but he ended up being too strong in top and was actually OP.

>They have no idea how to balance they're just nerfing favourite of the month Champions and leaving the ones that are actually hard to deal with...

Really?
Do you know who made this game? 
You have no idea what you're on about.
It's the PBE as well. Keep in mind: 
#**PBE Content is tentative and iterative - what you see may not reflect what eventually gets pushed to live servers! Manage your expectations accordingly.**

Basically deleting Leblanc.

Can't say I hate this change.

it will be effective at making it easier to dodge. and I will admit its a champion that needs to go down a peg or 2...

but it just doesn't quite look right at that speed.
I don't think this will go live, if it does it will be extremely unpopular.
It looks way too slow, and no I've never played LeBlanc.
